turns.ai_line: Good morning Doctor. I dey feel serious pain for my belle after I chop leftover rice wey I keep for house. I dey feel like say I wan throw up and I dey purge too. This kind thing no dey happen before oh, but recently na so so wahala I dey get after I chop. I dey live for area wey e dey always hot, maybe na the heat come spoil the food. I need your help abeg, this pain too much.

Doctor, the matter wey I dey explain so, na since when I chop the rice wey I keep since, na im I start to dey feel this kind bad belle. I feel say maybe na because the weather too hot na im make the food spoil, but I no sure. Na the first time wey this kind thing dey happen to me be this, I no fit sleep for night because of the pain. You fit help me check am?

Doctor, the pain still dey for my belle so, e strong well well. I don try to drink plenty water, but e just dey make me purge. The pain sef, e dey make me feel like say I wan vomit. E get any medicine wey I fit take or anything wey I fit do to make this pain stop?
